translations.translation: that Day he will be driven to your Lord.
To your Lord then will be the driving.
On that Day you will be driven to your Lord.
that will be the time to be driven to one's Lord.
On that day, the herding will be only towards your Lord.
The drive will be on that Day to your Lord!
To your Lord on that day shall be the driving.
upon that day unto thy Lord shall be the driving.
Unto thy Lord that day will be the driving.
on that Day he will be driven towards your Lord!
Unto thy Lord that Day is the drive.
that day he shall be driven toward your Lord.
That Day the Drive will be (all) to thy Lord!
The drive will be, on that Day, to your Lord (Allah)!
upon that Day the driving shall be to your Lord.
To your Lord on that Day is the drive.
To your Lord, that Day, will be the procession.

[75:30] on that day to your Lord will be the driving [of the souls] (al-masāq means al-sawq; this indicates the operator of the [above] idhā, ‘when’, the meaning being: ‘when the soul reaches the throat, it will be driven towards the judgement of its Lord’).
(Unto thy Lord that day) the Day of Judgement (will be the driving) the return of all created beings.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبالجملة: { إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْمَسَاقُ } [القيامة: 30] أي: سوقه إليه، ورجوعه نحوه، وحكمه عنده، وحسابه عليه

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { إِلى ربك يومئذٍ المساقُ } أي: إلى الله وإلى حكمه يُساق، لا إلى غيره، إمّا إلى الجنة وإمّا إلى النار، وهو مصدر: ساقه مساقاً
